alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 11:36AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect Oxford...Franklin... southeastern Coos and northeastern Carroll Counties... At 1135 AM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Rangeley to near Andover to near Berlin...and moving east AT 25 MPH. Locations impacted include... Conway, Berlin, Farmington, Lancaster, Fryeburg, Bethel, Eustis, Rangeley, Rumford, Jay, Dixfield, Kingfield, Canton, Andover, Carrabassett Valley, Errol, Grafton, Wilton, Phillips, and Weld. This also includes... Umbagog Lake State Park, Mount Jefferson, Mount Madison, Mount Eisenhower, and Wildcat Mountain. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Southern Coos
